message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer for your business. I'm willing to make a very competitive offer to get us started. I'm offering the product to you for $1200000.

I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1100000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm afraid $1100000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my initial offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1150000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to offer $1120000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from it.

I understand that you're trying to save some money, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with $1120000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm counteroffering at $1180000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the value the product brings to the table.

I understand that you're trying to get a fair price for the product, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable with $1180000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from your last offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1140000. I think this is a fair price considering the value I'll get from the product.
